com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.player.view

Interface PlayerView.PlayerEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GAPlayerFragment, PlayerFragment
    Enclosing class:
    PlayerView

    public static interface PlayerView.PlayerEventListener
    PlayerEventListener contains all events of Player's child The fragment contains the Player should implement to maintain MVC structure

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • onGrayBackClick

        void onGrayBackClick()
        The callback function when gray back clicked

      • onPlayerVerticalScrollStop

        void onPlayerVerticalScrollStop(int index,
                                boolean isViewTouchedDown)
        The callback function when vertical scroll stopped
        Parameters:
        index - indicate which player item is in the center
        isViewTouchedDown - the boolean is used to notify whether the move is caused by service or by user
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView

      • onPlayerVerticalScrolling

        void onPlayerVerticalScrolling()
        The callback function when vertical scroll performing
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView

      • onPlayerHorizontalScrollStop

        void onPlayerHorizontalScrollStop(boolean isOrderChanged,
                                  int direction,
                                  boolean isViewTouchedDown)
        The callback function when horizontal scroll stopped
        Parameters:
        isOrderChanged - the boolean indicate whether really change the player page
        direction - the direction indicate which page is going to switch to
        isViewTouchedDown - the boolean is used to notify whether the move is caused by service or by user
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView

      • onPlayerHorizontalScrolling

        The callback function when horizontal scroll performing
        See Also:

      • onPlayerDetailScrollStop

        void onPlayerDetailScrollStop(int index,
                              boolean isViewTouchedDown)
        The callback function when Player detail page scroll stopped
        Parameters:
        index - indicate the currently showing player detail page
        isViewTouchedDown - indicate the move is caused by service or by user
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView

      • onPlayerOptionChanged

        void onPlayerOptionChanged(int optionID,
                           int mode,
                           android.view.View v)
        The callback function when any one of Option in PlayerOptionContent changed
        Parameters:
        optionID - indicate which option is changed by user
        mode - indicate which mode is currently being changed
        v - the changed view
